home_tiles.title: Moana Gym Movie
home_tiles.content: We're watching Moana at the gym on September 13th, send the kids along!

home_tiles.title: Term 3 Holiday Programme
home_tiles.content: Get ready for an action-packed holiday full of fun, challenges, and creative activities at our gymnastics programme! Our experienced coaches will guide participants through engaging drills and exciting games, helping them develop new skills and build confidence in a supportive and energetic environment.

home_tiles.title: Downton Abbey: The Grand Finale
home_tiles.content: We're running a movie fundraiser at Brooklyn Cinema on September 17th

splash_subtitle: At Harbour City Gymnatics we offer gymnastics programmes for all ages and abilities.
contact_subtitle: Send us your questions about what you're after, or express interest in enrolling in a class.
